name: MORE Climbing!
description:
Climb your way up a beautiful low poly endless wall while dodging the WORSE! Try to beat your friends at the online leaderboard! Who is the best climber?

Features

- Beautiful, minimalistic Low-Poly look

- HTML5 playable

- Online Leaderboards

- Endless Levels 

Controls:

Use 'A' and 'D' to move and 'SPACE' to jump!
